item.title: Mac OSX Lion – Remove “all my files” from Finder
item.description: Finder on Mac OS X Lion by default is always showing “All My Files” on every new window. Well to be honest not even once I found it useful, never used it since the first install. Even if you are a geeky Terminal fan, there are always times that you start up Finder, and you need to get faster to your important files.
